name: email-tabs
description: Experimental extension to email a list of your tabs
author: Ian Bicking <ibicking@mozilla.com>

scripts.build:deps: mkdir -p addon/build/ && cp node_modules/react/umd/react.production.min.js node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom.production.min.js node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom-server.browser.production.min.js addon/build/ && babel --retain-lines addon/popup.jsx > addon/build/popup.js
scripts.package: npm run build && cp web-ext-artifacts/`ls -t1 web-ext-artifacts | head -n 1` addon.xpi
scripts.run: mkdir -p ./Profile && npm run build:deps && web-ext run --source-dir=addon -p ./Profile --browser-console --keep-profile-changes -f ${FIREFOX:-nightly}
